Title: Ministry of Social Justice Issued Young Professional Vacancy Notification
Summary:

- Ambedkar International Centre (DAIC) under the Ministry of Social Justice & Empowerment has announced recruitment for Young Professionals in 2025

Title: MRVC Recruitment 2025 Notification
Summary:
- MRVC   Recruitment 2025 : The Mumbai Railway Vikas Corporation Ltd (MRVC), a public sector undertaking under the Ministry of Railways, is seeking dynamic candidates for the 01 position of AGM/JGM/DGM (Rolling Stock) on a contractual basis
- The contract will be initially for two years, with the possibility of extension
- Interested candidates should apply via email with the required documents by April 10, 2025

- ESIC Ayurveda Physician Recruitment 2025 : The Employees’ State Insurance Corporation (ESIC) has announced the ESIC Ayurveda Recruitment 2025 for the post of Ayurveda Physician on a contract basis
- This is a great opportunity for experienced Ayurveda professionals to work in a government healthcare setting
- Below are all the essential details regarding eligibility, vacancy, and the application process

- KGMU Lab Technician Recruitment 2025 : King George’s Medical University (KGMU), Lucknow, has announced a recruitment notification for the temporary position of Lab Technician in a research project
- The project, titled “Study of Molecular Representativeness of Circulating Tumour DNA from Saliva and Blood – A Prospective Multicentric Observational Study,” is sanctioned by the Department of Health Research (DHR), Government of India
- The recruitment will be conducted under the guidance of Dr

- Eligible and interested candidates can apply only through email at ananda

- This is a great opportunity for candidates in the medical, life sciences, nutrition, and public health fields
- The recruitment is on a temporary contract basis, and the selection will be through an online interview

- RRB NTPC Coding Decoding Questions and Answers for CBT : Coding-Decoding is an important topic in the RRB NTPC CBT exam under the General Intelligence and Reasoning section
- It tests a candidate’s ability to identify patterns and relationships in letters, numbers, or words
- The questions follow different formats, such as letter shifting, number substitution, word replacement, and mixed pattern coding

- Indian Museum Kolkata   Recruitment 2025 : The Indian Museum, Kolkata, under the Ministry of Culture, Government of India, is inviting applications from retired officials of the Central Government or Central Autonomous Bodies for the 04 position of consultants
- The appointment will be on a contractual basis, with an initial period of one year and extendable up to the age of 65
- Interested candidates should submit their applications by email or post by April 4, 2025

- Eligible and interested candidates can apply online mode
- If you are interested in applying for the IIM Raipur Non-Teaching Posts, make sure you fulfill the requirements

Title: ADA Project Scientist B and C Recruitment 2025 Notification
Summary:
- ADA   Recruitment 2025 : The Aeronautical Development Agency (ADA), under the Ministry of Defence, Government of India, is inviting applications for the 137 positions of Project Scientist ‘B’ and Project Scientist ‘C’ on a limited tenure contract basis
- These positions are open to candidates with a bachelor’s degree in technology
- Interested candidates can apply online through the ADA website from March 17, 2025 to April 21, 2025

- Railway RRB Group D Practice Mock Test SET-71 for CBT Exam: Preparing for the Railway Recruitment Board (RRB) Group D CBT exam requires consistent practice and a thorough understanding of the exam pattern
- This  Mock Test SET-71  is designed to help you assess your preparation level and improve your performance in the actual exam
- The test covers all the key sections of the RRB Group D syllabus, including Mathematics, General Intelligence & Reasoning, General Science, and General Awareness

Title: PSPCL Company Secretary Recruitment 2025 Notification
Summary:
